pkgmetadata.longdescription: Local and Global Beta Regression // Fit a regression model for when the response variable is presented as a ratio or proportion. This adjustment can occur globally, with the same estimate for the entire study space, or locally, where a beta regression model is fitted for each region, considering only influential locations for that area. Da Silva, A. R. and Lima, A. O. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.spasta.2017.07.011.
